title: University of California Regents v Bakke - issue

content.question: The case of University of California Regents v. Bakke concerned which of the following issues?

choices.label: The ban on de jure segregation in California colleges
The constitutionality of policies made to correct racial injustice
Requirements for equal sports opportunities for women
Provisions for equal access to public buildings for the physically disabled
The expulsion of Japanese students from California universities

content.answer: The constitutionality of policies made to correct racial injustice

topic.text: 8.10: The African American Civil Rights Movement (1960s)

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
